title: stat_normalize
description: This program will convert and average a sequence of volume-based statistics in Talairach space.

resolution.title: Output Resolution
resolution.description: Set output resolution in mm (default is 8mm).

field_of_view.title: Output Field of View
field_of_view.description: Set output field of view (default is 256).

sph_avg.title: Spherical Coordinates Average
sph_avg.description: Average in spherical coordinates by specifying hemisphere and surface.

fix_xfm_flag.title: Fix Transform
fix_xfm_flag.description: Fix transform for non-zero center of original volume.

float2int_option.title: Float to Int
float2int_option.description: Specify float to int conversion to tkregister or round.
